title: Mobile-Based Instructional Development Program Effectiveness Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Tool Proficiency and Online Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a Smartphone-Centric Restricted Technology Environment, Emphasizing Personalized Learning Experiences Reflected by Formative Assessment Feedback

learning_goals: Improve online lecture design capabilities by 80% or more using mobile learning modules
Improve instructional strategy application skills by 70% through feedback and best practices analysis
Apply technology-based instructional methods to actual classes at least twice weekly through daily 15-minute microlearning

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
